#saveINTE

What is the Capilano U Interactive Design Program All About?

Interactive Design at Capilano University is the best program of its kind in BC, with a phenomenal success rate in sending well-trained graduates into the technology sector of British Columbia, helping transition BC's economy toward innovation and growth in high-tech.

Contact us: now@saveinte.ca
